name: GCSGateway
0:
”Alexa, tell g. c. s. gateway to turn on the lights”
”Alexa, tell g. c. s. gateway to set the lights to 50 percent”
”Alexa, tell g. c. s. gateway to turn off the lights”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: g. c. s. gateway
des: Connect GCS Gateway with the Amazon Echo and control the devices that is connected to the GCS Gateway. Currently, it can only control the power state and the brightness of lighting devices.
